title: Former GOP representative Liz Cheney to campaign for Harris at birthplace of Republican party
content: US Vice president Kamala Harris targets dissatisfied Republicans by visiting the birthplace of the GOP in Ripon, Wisconsin, accompanied by former Representative Liz Cheney, a vocal Trump critic. Cheney's endorsement, alongside her father's, and support from other prominent Republicans highlight the campaign's efforts to sway key voters ahead of the 2024 election.
summary: US Vice president Kamala Harris targets dissatisfied Republicans by visiting the birthplace of the GOP in Ripon, Wisconsin, accompanied by former Representative Liz Cheney, a vocal Trump critic. Cheney's endorsement, alongside her father's, and support from other prominent Republicans highlight the campaign's efforts to sway key voters ahead of the 2024 election.

title: King Charles misses 'darling boy' Harry but it is William who...
content: "With Prince Harry, it’s all an issue of trust," said Fordwich. "Prince William is the most unlikely royal to ever forgive Harry for all his despicable indiscretions. He is now very much seen and accepted as the family enforcer, taking on the hard-line ruler role of his grandfather, Prince Philip. In this capacity, it’s widely known within the family that Prince William has laid down an absolute ban on Harry returning in any way, shape or form to his former royal family fold," Fordwich said.
summary: "With Prince Harry, it’s all an issue of trust," said Fordwich. "Prince William is the most unlikely royal to ever forgive Harry for all his despicable indiscretions. He is now very much seen and accepted as the family enforcer, taking on the hard-line ruler role of his grandfather, Prince Philip. In this capacity, it’s widely known within the family that Prince William has laid down an absolute ban on Harry returning in any way, shape or form to his former royal family fold," Fordwich said.

title: 'I think that would be a little ...': Biden 'discussing' possible Israeli strikes on Iran oil facilities
content: US President Joe Biden is discussing potential Israeli strikes on Iranian oil facilities, leading to a five per cent surge in oil prices. He stressed that the US advises rather than directs Israel's actions. The discussions come amid rising tensions following Iran's missile attack on Israel and the impending US presidential election.
summary: US President Joe Biden is discussing potential Israeli strikes on Iranian oil facilities, leading to a five per cent surge in oil prices. He stressed that the US advises rather than directs Israel's actions. The discussions come amid rising tensions following Iran's missile attack on Israel and the impending US presidential election.

title: Hurricane Helene leaves 200 dead as Georgia and North Carolina report more fatalities
content: Hurricane Helene has resulted in 200 fatalities, severely impacting Georgia and North Carolina with rescue operations ongoing. The death toll rose from 189 to 200, with Georgia adding eight deaths and North Carolina adding three to their totals.Federal support is pledged for recovery, with President Biden and Vice President Harris visiting affected areas. The storm made devastating landfall in Florida and is the deadliest since Hurricane Katrina.
summary: Hurricane Helene has resulted in 200 fatalities, severely impacting Georgia and North Carolina with rescue operations ongoing. The death toll rose from 189 to 200, with Georgia adding eight deaths and North Carolina adding three to their totals.Federal support is pledged for recovery, with President Biden and Vice President Harris visiting affected areas. The storm made devastating landfall in Florida and is the deadliest since Hurricane Katrina.

title: 'That's panic...': Expert decodes Tim Walz’s body language during debate
content: During the vice presidential debate, Minnesota governor Tim Walz faced scrutiny over his claim about being present during the Tiananmen Square protests. A body language expert noted his signs of panic and diversion tactics when confronted about his actual travel dates to Asia.
summary: During the vice presidential debate, Minnesota governor Tim Walz faced scrutiny over his claim about being present during the Tiananmen Square protests. A body language expert noted his signs of panic and diversion tactics when confronted about his actual travel dates to Asia.

title: Trump campaign reacts to Sunny Hostin's 'Melania hates Donald' claim: 'DISGUSTING'
content: Trump's campaign condemned Sunny Hostin's viral claim on The View that Melania Trump hates her husband and wishes to distance herself from him. This comes amid Melania's memoir's endorsement of women's reproductive rights, contrasting her husband and the Republican Party's anti-abortion stance. Sunny Hostin, however, is not alone in what she thinks about Melania; Anthony Scaramucci earlier said the same thing about Melania's relationship with Donald Trump.
summary: Trump's campaign condemned Sunny Hostin's viral claim on The View that Melania Trump hates her husband and wishes to distance herself from him. This comes amid Melania's memoir's endorsement of women's reproductive rights, contrasting her husband and the Republican Party's anti-abortion stance. Sunny Hostin, however, is not alone in what she thinks about Melania; Anthony Scaramucci earlier said the same thing about Melania's relationship with Donald Trump.

title: 'She's been my biggest supporter since day one': Elon Musk praises his mother Maye Musk
content: Elon Musk's mother, Maye Musk, expressed gratitude on social media after Elon described her as his greatest supporter. Highlighting his visionary ideas, she cited Starlink's critical role in providing internet during disasters like Hurricane Helene, emphasizing his foresight and care for the future.
summary: Elon Musk's mother, Maye Musk, expressed gratitude on social media after Elon described her as his greatest supporter. Highlighting his visionary ideas, she cited Starlink's critical role in providing internet during disasters like Hurricane Helene, emphasizing his foresight and care for the future.

title: At least 50 killed as boat capsizes in eastern Congo lake
content: A boat overloaded with passengers capsized on Lake Kivu, eastern Congo, killing at least 50 people. The vessel was en route from Minova to Goma. Overcrowding and negligence are blamed as the boat had a capacity for about 30 passengers but carried around 100. Rescue efforts continue, with ten survivors receiving medical care.
summary: A boat overloaded with passengers capsized on Lake Kivu, eastern Congo, killing at least 50 people. The vessel was en route from Minova to Goma. Overcrowding and negligence are blamed as the boat had a capacity for about 30 passengers but carried around 100. Rescue efforts continue, with ten survivors receiving medical care.

title: On Elon Musk's 'how many people' question over Diddy, singer says, 'Ask your friends...'
content: When Elon Musk asked the question about Hollywood's involvement with Diddy as every day a new name pops up in connection with Diddy's infamous parties, he probably did not expect to get a straight up reply from Aubrey O'Day. " “..ask your friends, they will tell you," Aubrey posted implying that Elon Musk's "friends" knew about Diddy and his shady dealings.
summary: When Elon Musk asked the question about Hollywood's involvement with Diddy as every day a new name pops up in connection with Diddy's infamous parties, he probably did not expect to get a straight up reply from Aubrey O'Day. " “..ask your friends, they will tell you," Aubrey posted implying that Elon Musk's "friends" knew about Diddy and his shady dealings.

title: Did Tim Walz lie about his 17 year old son witnessing a shooting?
content: During a debate, Democrat Tim Walz claimed his son witnessed a community centre shooting, which Republican JD Vance sympathetically addressed. However, journalist Kyle Becker disputed Walz's claim, stating police records show the incident occurred outside, calling Walz's statement into question.
summary: During a debate, Democrat Tim Walz claimed his son witnessed a community centre shooting, which Republican JD Vance sympathetically addressed. However, journalist Kyle Becker disputed Walz's claim, stating police records show the incident occurred outside, calling Walz's statement into question.

title: US couple married for over 50 years die hugging each other during Hurricane Helene
content: A South Carolina couple, Marcia and Jerry Savage, both in their 70s, died when a tree fell on their home during Hurricane Helene. Their grandson had just checked on them before the incident. The storm has claimed over 190 lives across multiple states.
summary: A South Carolina couple, Marcia and Jerry Savage, both in their 70s, died when a tree fell on their home during Hurricane Helene. Their grandson had just checked on them before the incident. The storm has claimed over 190 lives across multiple states.

title: Megyn Kelly asks why Kamala Harris' husband paraded like 'ideal husband on steroids'
content: ​Donald Trump Jr said the allegations against Kamala Harris' husband Doug Emhoff were not covered properly. "Why have I seen exactly ZERO coverage of this story? What happened? Our media is a disgrace. Make sure everyone sees it since the media is clearly running cover for Kamala’s husband," Donald Trump Jr said.
summary: ​Donald Trump Jr said the allegations against Kamala Harris' husband Doug Emhoff were not covered properly. "Why have I seen exactly ZERO coverage of this story? What happened? Our media is a disgrace. Make sure everyone sees it since the media is clearly running cover for Kamala’s husband," Donald Trump Jr said.

title: Sri Lanka's President Anura Kumara Dissanayake announces new cabinet, takes charge of agriculture
content: Anura Kumara Dissanayake, now President of Sri Lanka, has assumed control of several key ministries and announced his cabinet appointments. With a focus on eradicating rural poverty and supporting public servants, Dissanayake emphasised unity across all communities. Harini Amarasuriya was appointed as prime minister and will oversee justice, education, and labour.
summary: Anura Kumara Dissanayake, now President of Sri Lanka, has assumed control of several key ministries and announced his cabinet appointments. With a focus on eradicating rural poverty and supporting public servants, Dissanayake emphasised unity across all communities. Harini Amarasuriya was appointed as prime minister and will oversee justice, education, and labour.

title: Ryanair Boeing jet with 184 on board catches fire in Italy before take-off
content: ​Planes were allowed to fly again at 11.25 am (local time) from Italy's Aeroporti di Puglia airport in Brindisi which saw a temporary suspension of flights after flames were spotted on a Ryanair flight carrying 184 passengers. The Boeing had to abort its take off and was immediately evacuated. Initial reports say the fire was sparked from an issue with the engine, the Sun reported.
summary: ​Planes were allowed to fly again at 11.25 am (local time) from Italy's Aeroporti di Puglia airport in Brindisi which saw a temporary suspension of flights after flames were spotted on a Ryanair flight carrying 184 passengers. The Boeing had to abort its take off and was immediately evacuated. Initial reports say the fire was sparked from an issue with the engine, the Sun reported.

title: Nate Silver says Kennedy Jr is a bigger boost than Taylor Swift because...
content: In the 2024 election, major endorsements included Taylor Swift and Oprah Winfrey supporting Kamala Harris. However, pollster Nate Silver deemed RFK Jr’s endorsement of Donald Trump more impactful, coinciding with a dip in Harris's poll numbers. While Swift's endorsement drove voter registration, it had minimal influence on voter support, according to an ABC News poll.
summary: In the 2024 election, major endorsements included Taylor Swift and Oprah Winfrey supporting Kamala Harris. However, pollster Nate Silver deemed RFK Jr’s endorsement of Donald Trump more impactful, coinciding with a dip in Harris's poll numbers. While Swift's endorsement drove voter registration, it had minimal influence on voter support, according to an ABC News poll.

title: Emirates cancels flights to Iraq, Iran and Jordan amid regional unrest
content: Due to regional unrest following an Iranian missile strike on Israel, Emirates airline has canceled flights to Iraq, Iran, and Jordan from October 3-5. Lufthansa has also suspended its flights to Beirut, Tel Aviv, and Tehran amid the ongoing tensions. Israeli airstrikes targeted Hezbollah's stronghold in Beirut.
summary: Due to regional unrest following an Iranian missile strike on Israel, Emirates airline has canceled flights to Iraq, Iran, and Jordan from October 3-5. Lufthansa has also suspended its flights to Beirut, Tel Aviv, and Tehran amid the ongoing tensions. Israeli airstrikes targeted Hezbollah's stronghold in Beirut.

title: Diddy's celeb guests knew when to leave the party; 'what happened before 2 am...'
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs' parties were infamous for their wild late-night activities, with Hollywood A-listers often leaving before things got crazier. ​They had a signal that told them to make an exit and it was girls shedding their clothes. "Girls would start to lose their clothes. That was the signal for people to leave," a report said citing sources.
summary: Sean "Diddy" Combs' parties were infamous for their wild late-night activities, with Hollywood A-listers often leaving before things got crazier. ​They had a signal that told them to make an exit and it was girls shedding their clothes. "Girls would start to lose their clothes. That was the signal for people to leave," a report said citing sources.

title: Lebanon state media says new Israeli strikes hit south Beirut
content: In Beirut, three Israeli air strikes targeted Hezbollah's stronghold in southern Beirut, hitting a building evacuated earlier. Israel has shifted its focus from Gaza to Lebanon, intensifying its military operations. The recent bombings have resulted in over 1,000 casualties and mass displacements, following the killing of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah last week.
summary: In Beirut, three Israeli air strikes targeted Hezbollah's stronghold in southern Beirut, hitting a building evacuated earlier. Israel has shifted its focus from Gaza to Lebanon, intensifying its military operations. The recent bombings have resulted in over 1,000 casualties and mass displacements, following the killing of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah last week.

title: The dynamic Indo-US corridor enhancing trade, investment, and growth
San Diego zoo’s male flamingo couple becomes first-time dads
content: Two male lesser flamingos at San Diego Zoo Safari Park have become first-time dads after hatching an egg together. The pair, both in their 40s, excel at brooding and feeding their chick with crop milk. Same-sex co-parenting is increasingly observed in birds like penguins and vultures in zoos worldwide.
summary: Two male lesser flamingos at San Diego Zoo Safari Park have become first-time dads after hatching an egg together. The pair, both in their 40s, excel at brooding and feeding their chick with crop milk. Same-sex co-parenting is increasingly observed in birds like penguins and vultures in zoos worldwide.
